```{r}

library(bsseq)
## library(ColonDNATopology)
library(HDF5Array)
library(BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg19)
library(BiocParallel)
bsseq <- loadHDF5SummarizedExperiment(system.file( "hdf5", "se_hdf5", package="ColonDNATopology" ))
```


```{r}

segmentation_40K <- copyNumberForRes( bsseq, 40000, BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(5) )
segmentation_100K <- copyNumberForRes( bsseq, 100000, BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(5) )



saveRDS( copyNums, file="../output/rds/segmentation_40K.rds" )
saveRDS( copyNums, file="../output/rds/segmentation_100K_v4.rds" )


```
